Get a text chunk by id

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Text chunk","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[0-9A-HJKMNP-TV-Z]{26}$"},"ownerType":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string","enum":["canon"]},{"type":"string","enum":["instance"]}]},"ownerId":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[0-9A-HJKMNP-TV-Z]{26}$"},"fieldPath":{"type":"string","minLength":1},"text":{"type":"string","minLength":1},"embedding":{"type":"object","properties":{"model":{"type":"string"},"dimension":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"exclusiveMinimum":true},"embeddedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"required":["model"]},"meta":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"nullable":true}}},"required":["id","ownerType","ownerId","fieldPath","text"],"additionalProperties":false}},"required":["data"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
